Cross site scripting.impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
Cross site scripting.recommendation: Your script should filter metacharacters from user input.
Cross site scripting.name: Cross site scripting
Cross site scripting.title: 跨站脚本
Cross site scripting.suggest: 您的脚本应该从用户输入过滤元字符。
Cross site scripting.refs: {{"Acunetix Cross Site Scripting Attack",http://www.acunetix.com/websitesecurity/cross-site-scripting.htm},{"VIDEO: How Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Works",http://www.acunetix.com/blog/web-security-zone/video-how-cross-site-scripting-xss-works/},{"The Cross Site Scripting Faq",http://www.cgisecurity.com/xss-faq.html},{"OWASP Cross Site Scripting",http://www.owasp.org/index.php/Cross_Site_Scripting},{"XSS Filter Evasion Cheat Sheet",https://www.owasp.org/index.php/XSS_Filter_Evasion_Cheat_Sheet},{"Cross site scripting","http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-site_scripting "},{"OWASP PHP Top 5",http://www.owasp.org/index.php/PHP_Top_5},{"How To: Prevent Cross-Site Scripting in ASP.NET",http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms998274.aspx}}
Cross site scripting.analyse: 恶意用户可能会将JavaScript，VBScript，ActiveX，HTML或Flash注入易受攻击的应用程序中，以愚弄用户以从中收集数据。\r \n攻击者可以窃取会话cookie并接管帐户，冒充用户。 \r \n也可以修改呈现给用户的页面内容。

File upload.impact: If the uploaded files are not safely checked an attacker may upload malicious files.
File upload.recommendation: Restrict file types accepted for upload: check the file extension and only allow certain files to be uploaded. Use a whitelist approach instead of a blacklist. Check for double extensions such as .php.png. Check for files without a filename like .htaccess (on ASP.NET, check for configuration files like web.config). Change the permissions on the upload folder so the files within it are not executable. If possible, rename the files that are uploaded.
File upload.name: File upload
File upload.title: 上传文件
File upload.suggest: 限制接受上传的文件类型：检查文件扩展名，只允许上传某些文件，使用白名单方法而不是黑名单，检查.php.png等双重扩展名。检查文件名，如.htaccess （在ASP.NET上，检查配置文件，如web.config）更改上传文件夹的权限，使其中的文件不可执行，如果可能，重命名上传的文件。
File upload.analyse: 如果未安全检查上传的文件，攻击者可能会上传恶意文件。

Nagios core config manager SQL injection.impact: An attacker may execute arbitrary SQL statements on the vulnerable system. This may compromise the integrity of your database and/or expose sensitive information. <br/><br/>Depending on the back-end database in use, SQL injection vulnerabilities lead to varying levels of data/system access for the attacker. It may be possible to not only manipulate existing queries, but to UNION in arbitrary data, use sub selects, or append additional queries. In some cases, it may be possible to read in or write out to files, or to execute shell commands on the underlying operating system.<br/><br/>Certain SQL Servers such as Microsoft SQL Server contain stored and extended procedures (database server functions). If an attacker can obtain access to these procedures it may be possible to compromise the entire machine.
Nagios core config manager SQL injection.recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of Nagios.
Nagios core config manager SQL injection.name: Nagios core config manager SQL injection vulnerability
Nagios core config manager SQL injection.title: Nagios核心配置管理器SQL注入漏洞
Nagios core config manager SQL injection.analyse: 攻击者可能在易受攻击的系统上执行任意SQL语句，这可能会危及数据库的完整性和/或暴露敏感信息。<br/> <br/>根据使用的后端数据库，SQL注入漏洞导致对于攻击者的数据/系统访问级别不同，可能不仅可以操纵现有查询，而且可以对UNION进行任意数据处理，使用子选择或追加附加查询。在某些情况下，可能会读入或写入文件或在底层操作系统上执行shell命令。<br/>某些SQL Server（如Microsoft SQL Server）包含存储和扩展过程（数据库服务器功能），如果攻击者可以获取访问权限对于这些程序，可能会损害整个机器。

Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.

Possible cross site scripting via Host h.impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user. This vulnerability is exploitable on Internet Explorer.

CRIME SSL/TLS attack.impact: An attacker can perform session hijacking on an authenticated web session, allowing the launching of further attacks.
CRIME SSL/TLS attack.recommendation: CRIME can be defeated by preventing the use of compression, either at the client end, by the browser disabling the compression of HTTPS requests, or by the website preventing the use of data compression on such transactions using the protocol negotiation features of the TLS protocol. As detailed in The Transport Layer Security (TLS) Protocol Version 1.2, the client sends a list of compression algorithms in its ClientHello message, and the server picks one of them and sends it back in its ServerHello message. The server can only choose a compression method the client has offered, so if the client only offers 'none' (no compression), the data will not be compressed. Similarly, since 'no compression' must be allowed by all TLS clients, a server can always refuse to use compression.
CRIME SSL/TLS attack.name: CRIME SSL/TLS attack
CRIME SSL/TLS attack.title: CRIME SSL / TLS攻击
CRIME SSL/TLS attack.suggest: CRIME可以通过阻止在客户端使用压缩来阻止HTTPS请求的压缩，或阻止使用TLS协议的协议协商功能阻止对这种事务使用数据压缩的网站来消除如"传输层安全（TLS）协议版本1.2"中所述，客户端在其ClientHello消息中发送压缩算法列表，服务器选择其中一个，并将其发回ServerHello消息，服务器只能选择压缩方式，客户端只提供"无"（无压缩），数据不会被压缩，同样，由于所有TLS客户端都必须允许"无压缩"，所以服务器总是可以拒绝使用压缩。
CRIME SSL/TLS attack.analyse: 攻击者可以在经过身份验证的Web会话上执行会话劫持，允许发起进一步的攻击。

Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.

It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.

Email Header Injection.impact: One of the input parameters of the <strong>mail</strong> function are not properly validated. Therefore, it's possible for a remote attacker to inject custom SMTP headers. For example, an attacker can inject additional email recipients and use the script for sending spam.
Email Header Injection.recommendation: You need to restrict CR(0x13) and LF(0x10) from the user input. Check references for more information about fixing this vulnerability.
Email Header Injection.name: Email Header Injection
Email Header Injection.title: 电子邮件标题注入
Email Header Injection.suggest: 您需要从用户输入中限制CR（0x13）和LF（0x10）。有关修复此漏洞的更多信息，请参阅参考。
Email Header Injection.refs: {{"Email Injection",http://www.securephpwiki.com/index.php/Email_Injection},{"PHP mail() Header Injection Through Subject and To Parameters",http://www.php-security.org/MOPB/MOPB-34-2007.html}}
Email Header Injection.analyse: <strong>邮件</ strong>函数的其中一个输入参数未被正确验证，因此远程攻击者可以注入自定义的SMTP头，例如攻击者可以注入额外的电子邮件收件人并使用该脚本发送垃圾邮件

Umbraco CMS TemplateService remote code.impact: An unauthenticated attacker can execute arbitrary code on the affected server.
Umbraco CMS TemplateService remote code.recommendation:
The vendor has released a fix for this issue, which remotes the web services component completely. <br/><br/>

If it is not possible to apply this fix, MWR propose adding a call to the Authenticate() function at the start of the TemplateService update() function. It should be noted that this is not an approved fix by the vendor, and care should be taken to ensure that this does not affect the operation of the application.
Umbraco CMS TemplateService remote code.name: Umbraco CMS TemplateService remote code execution
Umbraco CMS TemplateService remote code.title: Umbraco CMS TemplateService远程执行代码
Umbraco CMS TemplateService remote code.suggest: 供应商已经发布了一个针对此问题的修复程序，它完全可以远程访问Web服务组件。<br/> <br/> \r \n \r \n如果不可能应用此修复程序，MWR建议添加一个调用在TemplateService update（）函数开始时的Authenticate（）函数。应该注意的是，这不是供应商批准的修正，应该注意确保这不会影响应用程序的运行。"
Umbraco CMS TemplateService remote code.analyse: 未经身份验证的攻击者可以在受影响的服务器上执行任意代码。

Possible relative path overwrite.impact: On older versions of Internet Explorer it's possible to execute arbitrary JavaScript code using Internet Explorer's expression() function. An attacker can also extract the page source and potentially steal CSRF tokens using CSS selectors.
Possible relative path overwrite.recommendation: If possible, it's recommended to use absolute links for CSS imports. The problem can be partially mitigated by preventing framing. To prevent framing configure your web server to include an  X-Frame-Options: deny header on all pages.
Possible relative path overwrite.name: Possible relative path overwrite
Possible relative path overwrite.title: 可能的相对路径覆盖
Possible relative path overwrite.suggest: 如果可能，建议使用绝对链接进行CSS导入，可以通过防止框架来部分缓解问题。为了防止框架配置您的Web服务器，将X-Frame-Options：拒绝所有页面的标题。
Possible relative path overwrite.analyse: 在较旧版本的Internet Explorer中，可以使用Internet Explorer的expression（）函数执行任意JavaScript代码，攻击者还可以使用CSS选择器提取页面源并潜在地窃取CSRF令牌。

Remote XSL inclusion.impact: It is possible for a remote attacker to include a remote XSL file from local or remote resources. An attacker can use this flaw to perform XSS (cross-site scripting attacks), partial file inclusion attacks and in some case even execute PHP code.
Remote XSL inclusion.recommendation: Edit the source code to ensure that input is properly validated. Where is possible, it is recommended to make a list of accepted filenames and restrict the input to that list.
Remote XSL inclusion.name: Remote XSL inclusion
Remote XSL inclusion.title: 远程XSL包含
Remote XSL inclusion.suggest: 编辑源代码以确保输入被正确验证。可能的地方，建议列出接受的文件名，并将输入限制在该列表中。
Remote XSL inclusion.refs: {{"The hidden dangers of XSLTProcessor - Remote XSL injection",http://www.acunetix.com/blog/web-security-zone/articles/the-hidden-dangers-of-xsltprocessor-remote-xsl-injection/}}
Remote XSL inclusion.analyse: 远程攻击者可以从本地或远程资源中包含远程XSL文件，攻击者可以使用此漏洞执行XSS（跨站点脚本攻击），部分文件夹入攻击，甚至在某些情况下也可执行PHP代码。

Joomla! 1.6.0 SQL injection vulnerabilit.impact: An attacker may execute arbitrary SQL statements on the vulnerable system. This may compromise the integrity of your database and/or expose sensitive information. <br/><br/>Depending on the back-end database in use, SQL injection vulnerabilities lead to varying levels of data/system access for the attacker. It may be possible to not only manipulate existing queries, but to UNION in arbitrary data, use sub selects, or append additional queries. In some cases, it may be possible to read in or write out to files, or to execute shell commands on the underlying operating system.
Joomla! 1.6.0 SQL injection vulnerabilit.name: Joomla! 1.6.0 SQL injection vulnerability
Joomla! 1.6.0 SQL injection vulnerabilit.title: Joomla！1.6.0 SQL注入漏洞
Joomla! 1.6.0 SQL injection vulnerabilit.analyse: 攻击者可能在易受攻击的系统上执行任意SQL语句，这可能会危及数据库的完整性和/或暴露敏感信息。<br/> <br/>根据使用的后端数据库，SQL注入漏洞导致对于攻击者的数据/系统访问级别不同，可能不仅可以操纵现有查询，而且可以对UNION进行任意数据处理，使用子选择或追加附加查询。在某些情况下，可能会读入或写入文件，或在底层操作系统上执行shell命令。

Atlassian Jira DOM-based cross-site scri.impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
Atlassian Jira DOM-based cross-site scri.recommendation: Customers who have downloaded and installed JIRA should upgrade their existing JIRA installations or apply the patches to fix these vulnerabilities.
Atlassian Jira DOM-based cross-site scri.name: Atlassian Jira DOM-based cross-site scripting vulnerability
Atlassian Jira DOM-based cross-site scri.title: Atlassian Jira基于DOM的跨站点脚本漏洞
Atlassian Jira DOM-based cross-site scri.suggest: 下载并安装JIRA的客户应升级其现有的JIRA安装或应用补丁来修复这些漏洞。
Atlassian Jira DOM-based cross-site scri.analyse: 恶意用户可能会将JavaScript，VBScript，ActiveX，HTML或Flash注入易受攻击的应用程序中，以愚弄用户以从中收集数据。\r \n攻击者可以窃取会话cookie并接管帐户，冒充用户。 \r \n也可以修改呈现给用户的页面内容。

Apache version up to 1.3.33 htpasswd loc.impact: Since the program is not setuid, this vulnerability does not have a local impact. However, this may be an issue if the software is called from a CGI script. An attacker may be able to supply malformed data to the program which will cause the overflow to occur.
Apache version up to 1.3.33 htpasswd loc.recommendation:
Make sure htpasswd does not run setuid and is not accessible
through any CGI scripts.
Apache version up to 1.3.33 htpasswd loc.name: Apache version up to 1.3.33 htpasswd local overflow

Joomla! 3.2.1 sql injection.impact: An attacker may execute arbitrary SQL statements on the vulnerable system. This may compromise the integrity of your database and/or expose sensitive information. <br/><br/>Depending on the back-end database in use, SQL injection vulnerabilities lead to varying levels of data/system access for the attacker. It may be possible to not only manipulate existing queries, but to UNION in arbitrary data, use sub selects, or append additional queries. In some cases, it may be possible to read in or write out to files, or to execute shell commands on the underlying operating system.<br/><br/>Certain SQL Servers such as Microsoft SQL Server contain stored and extended procedures (database server functions). If an attacker can obtain access to these procedures it may be possible to compromise the entire machine.
Joomla! 3.2.1 sql injection.recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of Joomla!.
Joomla! 3.2.1 sql injection.name: Joomla! 3.2.1 sql injection
Joomla! 3.2.1 sql injection.title: Joomla！3.2.1 sql注入
Joomla! 3.2.1 sql injection.analyse: 攻击者可能在易受攻击的系统上执行任意SQL语句，这可能会危及数据库的完整性和/或暴露敏感信息。<br/> <br/>根据使用的后端数据库，SQL注入漏洞导致对于攻击者的数据/系统访问级别不同，可能不仅可以操纵现有查询，而且可以对UNION进行任意数据处理，使用子选择或追加附加查询。在某些情况下，可能会读入或写入文件或在底层操作系统上执行shell命令。<br/>某些SQL Server（如Microsoft SQL Server）包含存储和扩展过程（数据库服务器功能），如果攻击者可以获取访问权限对于这些程序，可能会损害整个机器。

Path Traversal in Oracle GlassFish serve.impact: By exploiting path traversal vulnerabilities, attackers step out of the root directory and access files in other directories. As a result, attackers might view restricted files or execute commands, leading to a full compromise of the Web server.
Path Traversal in Oracle GlassFish serve.recommendation:
No fix is available at this time for the GlassFish Server Open Source
Edition release. However, this vulnerability can be mitigated with the use
of technologies, such as Web Application Firewalls (WAF) or Intrusion
Prevention Systems (IPS).  <br/><br/>

Oracle GlassFish Server 3.x which is the current commercial release of GlassFish is not affected.

GlassFish Server Open Source  
 Edition版本目前没有可用的修补程序，但可以使用 
of技术（如Web应用程序防火墙（WAF）或Intrusion  
 Prevention）来减轻此漏洞系统（IPS）。<br/> <br/>  
  
 GlassFish的当前商业版本的GlassFish Server 3.x不受影响。

JBoss Seam remoting vulnerabilities.impact: Attacks can include disclosing local files, which may contain sensitive data such as passwords or private user data, using file: schemes or relative paths in the system identifier. Host header attack.impact: An attacker can manipulate the Host header as seen by the web application and cause the application to behave in unexpected ways.
Host header attack.recommendation:
The web application should use the SERVER_NAME instead of the Host header.
It should also create a dummy vhost that catches all requests with unrecognized Host headers. This can also be done under Nginx by specifying a non-wildcard SERVER_NAME, and under Apache by using a non-wildcard serverName and turning the UseCanonicalName directive on. Consult references for detailed information.
Host header attack.name: Host header attack
Host header attack.title: 主机头攻击
Host header attack.suggest: Web应用程序应该使用SERVER_NAME而不是主机头。\r \n它还应该创建一个虚拟的虚拟主机，用于捕获所有具有无法识别的主机头的请求，这也可以在Nginx下通过指定一个非通配符SERVER_NAME来完成， Apache通过使用非通配符serverName并转换UseCanonicalName指令。有关详细信息，请参阅参考。
Host header attack.refs: {{"Practical HTTP Host header attacks",http://www.skeletonscribe.net/2013/05/practical-http-host-header-attacks.html},{Apache,http://httpd.apache.org/docs/trunk/vhosts/examples.html#defaultallports},{nginx,http://wiki.nginx.org/ServerBlockExample},{"Automated Detection of Host Header Attacks",http://www.acunetix.com/blog/articles/automated-detection-of-host-header-attacks/}}
Host header attack.analyse: 攻击者可以操纵Web应用程序所看到的主机头，并导致应用程序以意想不到的方式运行。

File upload XSS (Java applet).impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
File upload XSS (Java applet).recommendation: Restrict file types accepted for upload: check the file extension and only allow certain files to be uploaded. Use a whitelist approach instead of a blacklist. Check for double extensions such as .php.png. Check for files without a filename like .htaccess (on ASP.NET, check for configuration files like web.config). Change the permissions on the upload folder so the files within it are not executable. If possible, rename the files that are uploaded.
File upload XSS (Java applet).name: File upload XSS (Java applet)
File upload XSS (Java applet).title: 文件上传XSS（Java applet）
File upload XSS (Java applet).suggest: 限制接受上传的文件类型：检查文件扩展名，只允许上传某些文件，使用白名单方法而不是黑名单，检查.php.png等双重扩展名。检查文件名，如.htaccess （在ASP.NET上，检查配置文件，如web.config）更改上传文件夹的权限，使其中的文件不可执行，如果可能，重命名上传的文件。
File upload XSS (Java applet).refs: {{"OWASP Unrestricted File Upload",http://www.owasp.org/index.php/Unrestricted_File_Upload},{"Why File Upload Forms are a major security threat",http://www.acunetix.com/websitesecurity/upload-forms-threat.htm}}
File upload XSS (Java applet).analyse: 恶意用户可能会将JavaScript，VBScript，ActiveX，HTML或Flash注入易受攻击的应用程序中，以愚弄用户以从中收集数据。\r \n攻击者可以窃取会话cookie并接管帐户，冒充用户。 \r \n也可以修改呈现给用户的页面内容。

Joomla! v3.2.2 SQL injection.impact: An attacker may execute arbitrary SQL statements on the vulnerable system. This may compromise the integrity of your database and/or expose sensitive information. <br/><br/>Depending on the back-end database in use, SQL injection vulnerabilities lead to varying levels of data/system access for the attacker. It may be possible to not only manipulate existing queries, but to UNION in arbitrary data, use sub selects, or append additional queries. In some cases, it may be possible to read in or write out to files, or to execute shell commands on the underlying operating system.<br/><br/>Certain SQL Servers such as Microsoft SQL Server contain stored and extended procedures (database server functions). If an attacker can obtain access to these procedures it may be possible to compromise the entire machine.
Joomla! v3.2.2 SQL injection.recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of Joomla!.
Joomla! v3.2.2 SQL injection.name: Joomla! v3.2.2 SQL injection
Joomla! v3.2.2 SQL injection.title: Joomla！v3.2.2 SQL注入
Joomla! v3.2.2 SQL injection.analyse: 攻击者可能在易受攻击的系统上执行任意SQL语句，这可能会危及数据库的完整性和/或暴露敏感信息。<br/> <br/>根据使用的后端数据库，SQL注入漏洞导致对于攻击者的数据/系统访问级别不同，可能不仅可以操纵现有查询，而且可以对UNION进行任意数据处理，使用子选择或追加附加查询。在某些情况下，可能会读入或写入文件或在底层操作系统上执行shell命令。<br/>某些SQL Server（如Microsoft SQL Server）包含存储和扩展过程（数据库服务器功能），如果攻击者可以获取访问权限对于这些程序，可能会损害整个机器。

vBulletin 4 (up to 4.1.2) search.php SQL.impact: An attacker may execute arbitrary SQL statements on the vulnerable system. This may compromise the integrity of your database and/or expose sensitive information. <br/><br/>Depending on the back-end database in use, SQL injection vulnerabilities lead to varying levels of data/system access for the attacker. It may be possible to not only manipulate existing queries, but to UNION in arbitrary data, use sub-selects, or append additional queries. In some cases, it may be possible to read in or write out to files, or to execute shell commands on the underlying operating system.
vBulletin 4 (up to 4.1.2) search.php SQL.recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of vBulletin.
vBulletin 4 (up to 4.1.2) search.php SQL.name: vBulletin 4 (up to 4.1.2) search.php SQL injection
vBulletin 4 (up to 4.1.2) search.php SQL.title: vBulletin 4（最高4.1.2）search.php SQL注入
vBulletin 4 (up to 4.1.2) search.php SQL.analyse: 攻击者可能在易受攻击的系统上执行任意SQL语句，这可能会危及数据库的完整性和/或暴露敏感信息。<br/> <br/>根据使用的后端数据库，SQL注入漏洞导致对于攻击者的数据/系统访问级别不同，可能不仅可以操纵现有查询，而且可以对UNION进行任意数据处理，使用子选择或追加其他查询。在某些情况下，可能会读取进入或写出文件，或在底层操作系统上执行shell命令。

Adobe Flex 3 DOM-based XSS vulnerability.impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
Adobe Flex 3 DOM-based XSS vulnerability.recommendation: Adobe Flex 3 users (both Flex 3 SDK and Flex Builder 3) should update their product installations with the Flex 3.0.2 SDK update.
Adobe Flex 3 DOM-based XSS vulnerability.name: Adobe Flex 3 DOM-based XSS vulnerability
Adobe Flex 3 DOM-based XSS vulnerability.title: Adobe Flex 3基于DOM的XSS漏洞
Adobe Flex 3 DOM-based XSS vulnerability.suggest: Adobe Flex 3用户（Flex 3 SDK和Flex Builder 3）都应使用Flex 3.0.2 SDK更新来更新其产品安装。
Adobe Flex 3 DOM-based XSS vulnerability.refs: {{"Update to Flex 3 to address potential cross-site scripting vulnerability",http://www.adobe.com/support/security/bulletins/apsb08-14.html},{"JavaScript Code Flow Manipulation, and a real world example advisory - Adobe Flex 3 Dom-Based XSS",http://blog.watchfire.com/wfblog/2008/06/javascript-code.html}}
Adobe Flex 3 DOM-based XSS vulnerability.analyse: 恶意用户可能会将JavaScript，VBScript，ActiveX，HTML或Flash注入易受攻击的应用程序中，以愚弄用户以从中收集数据。\r \n攻击者可以窃取会话cookie并接管帐户，冒充用户。 \r \n也可以修改呈现给用户的页面内容。

PHP object deserialization of user-suppl.impact: Web applications that accept untrusted data to deserialize could allow an attacker to perform different kinds of malicious attacks, such as Code Injection, SQL Injection, Path Traversal and Application Denial of Service, depending on the context.
PHP object deserialization of user-suppl.recommendation: PHP object deserialization should not be performed on user-supplied data. Do not use the unserialize() function with user-supplied input, use JSON functions instead.
PHP object deserialization of user-suppl.name: PHP object deserialization of user-supplied data
PHP object deserialization of user-suppl.title: PHP对象反序列化用户提供的数据
PHP object deserialization of user-suppl.suggest: PHP对象反序列化不应该在用户提供的数据上执行，不要使用用户提供的输入的unserialize（）函数，而是使用JSON函数。
PHP object deserialization of user-suppl.analyse: 接受不可信数据以反序列化的Web应用程序可能会允许攻击者根据上下文执行不同类型的恶意攻击，例如代码注入，SQL注入，路径遍历和应用程序拒绝服务。

Clickjacking: X-Frame-Options header mis.title: 点击劫持：X-Frame-Options头丢失

Genericons DOM-based XSS vulnerability.impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
Genericons DOM-based XSS vulnerability.recommendation: Remove the <span class="bb-dark"><strong>example.html</strong></span>  file located in the genericons directory.
Genericons DOM-based XSS vulnerability.name: Genericons DOM-based XSS vulnerability
Genericons DOM-based XSS vulnerability.title: Genericons基于DOM的XSS漏洞
Genericons DOM-based XSS vulnerability.suggest: 删除位于genericons目录中的<span class = "bb-dark "> <strong> example.html </ strong> </ span>文件。
Genericons DOM-based XSS vulnerability.refs: {{"WordPress 4.2.2 Security and Maintenance Release",https://wordpress.org/news/2015/05/wordpress-4-2-2/},{"JetPack and TwentyFifteen Vulnerable to DOM-based XSS",https://blog.sucuri.net/2015/05/jetpack-and-twentyfifteen-vulnerable-to-dom-based-xss.html},{Genericons,http://genericons.com/}}
Genericons DOM-based XSS vulnerability.analyse: 恶意用户可能会将JavaScript，VBScript，ActiveX，HTML或Flash注入易受攻击的应用程序中，以愚弄用户以从中收集数据。\r \n攻击者可以窃取会话cookie并接管帐户，冒充用户。 \r \n也可以修改呈现给用户的页面内容。

Blind XSS.impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
Blind XSS.recommendation: Your script should filter metacharacters from user input.
Blind XSS.name: Blind XSS
Blind XSS.title: 盲人XSS
Blind XSS.suggest: 您的脚本应该从用户输入过滤元字符。
Blind XSS.analyse: 恶意用户可能会将JavaScript，VBScript，ActiveX，HTML或Flash注入易受攻击的应用程序中，以愚弄用户以从中收集数据。\r \n攻击者可以窃取会话cookie并接管帐户，冒充用户。 \r \n也可以修改呈现给用户的页面内容。

MediaWiki SVG cross-site scripting vulne.impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
MediaWiki SVG cross-site scripting vulne.recommendation: The vulnerability has been fixed in MediaWiki version 1.24.2. It's recommended to upgrade to this version or the latest MediaWiki version.

MediaWiki SVG cross-site scripting vulne.analyse: 恶意用户可能会将JavaScript，VBScript，ActiveX，HTML或Flash注入易受攻击的应用程序中，以愚弄用户以从中收集数据。\r \n攻击者可以窃取会话cookie并接管帐户，冒充用户。 \r \n也可以修改呈现给用户的页面内容。

CRLF injection/HTTP response splitting (.impact: Is it possible for a remote attacker to inject custom HTTP headers. For example, an attacker can inject session cookies or HTML code. This may conduct to vulnerabilities like XSS (cross-site scripting) or session fixation.

CRLF injection/HTTP response splitting (.title: CRLF注入/ HTTP响应拆分（Web Server）
CRLF injection/HTTP response splitting (.suggest: 您需要从用户输入中限制CR（0x13）和LF（0x10），或对输出进行适当编码，以防止引入自定义HTTP头。

SQL injection.impact: An attacker may execute arbitrary SQL statements on the vulnerable system. This may compromise the integrity of your database and/or expose sensitive information. <br/><br/>Depending on the back-end database in use, SQL injection vulnerabilities lead to varying levels of data/system access for the attacker. It may be possible to not only manipulate existing queries, but to UNION in arbitrary data, use sub selects, or append additional queries. In some cases, it may be possible to read in or write out to files, or to execute shell commands on the underlying operating system.<br/><br/>Certain SQL Servers such as Microsoft SQL Server contain stored and extended procedures (database server functions). If an attacker can obtain access to these procedures it may be possible to compromise the entire machine.
SQL injection.recommendation: Your script should filter metacharacters from user input. <br/>Check detailed information for more information about fixing this vulnerability.
SQL injection.name: SQL injection
SQL injection.title: SQL注入
SQL injection.suggest: 您的脚本应该从用户输入过滤元字符。"请检查详细信息以获取有关修复此漏洞的更多信息。
SQL injection.refs: {{"Acunetix SQL Injection Attack",http://www.acunetix.com/websitesecurity/sql-injection.htm},{"VIDEO: SQL Injection tutorial",http://www.acunetix.com/blog/web-security-zone/video-sql-injection-tutorial/},{"OWASP Injection Flaws",http://www.owasp.org/index.php/Injection_Flaws},{"How to check for SQL injection vulnerabilities",http://www.acunetix.com/websitesecurity/sql-injection2/},{"SQL Injection Walkthrough",http://www.securiteam.com/securityreviews/5DP0N1P76E.html},{"OWASP PHP Top 5",http://www.owasp.org/index.php/PHP_Top_5}}
SQL injection.analyse: 攻击者可能在易受攻击的系统上执行任意SQL语句，这可能会危及数据库的完整性和/或暴露敏感信息。<br/> <br/>根据使用的后端数据库，SQL注入漏洞导致对于攻击者的数据/系统访问级别不同，可能不仅可以操纵现有查询，而且可以对UNION进行任意数据处理，使用子选择或追加附加查询。在某些情况下，可能会读入或写入文件或在底层操作系统上执行shell命令。<br/>某些SQL Server（如Microsoft SQL Server）包含存储和扩展过程（数据库服务器功能），如果攻击者可以获取访问权限对于这些程序，可能会损害整个机器。

Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.

Remote file inclusion XSS.impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
Remote file inclusion XSS.recommendation: Your server side code should verify if the URL from the user input is allowed to be retrieved and displayed or filter the response from the URL according to the context in which it is displayed.
Remote file inclusion XSS.name: Remote file inclusion XSS
Remote file inclusion XSS.title: 远程文件包含XSS
Remote file inclusion XSS.suggest: 您的服务器端代码应该验证来自用户输入的URL是否被允许被检索和显示，或者根据显示的上下文过滤来自URL的响应。

Remote file inclusion XSS.analyse: 恶意用户可能会将JavaScript，VBScript，ActiveX，HTML或Flash注入易受攻击的应用程序中，以愚弄用户以从中收集数据。\r \n攻击者可以窃取会话cookie并接管帐户，冒充用户。 \r \n也可以修改呈现给用户的页面内容。

Microsoft SQL Server weak password encry.impact: An attacker may use this flaw to elevate their privileges on the local database.
Microsoft SQL Server weak password encry.recommendation: Microsoft suggests using Windows Integrated Security. In this mode, SQL user access is tied to Windows user accounts, and no separate IDs are created. In addition, selecting the option 'Always prompt for login name and password' will prevent passwords from being written to the registry.

Microsoft SQL Server weak password encry.title: Microsoft SQL Server弱密码加密漏洞
Microsoft SQL Server weak password encry.suggest: Microsoft建议使用Windows集成安全性，在这种模式下，SQL用户访问与Windows用户帐户绑定，并且不会创建单独的ID。此外，选择"始终提示输入登录名和密码"将阻止密码被写入到注册表

XML external entity injection via extern.impact: Attacks can include disclosing local files, which may contain sensitive data such as passwords or private user data, using file: schemes or relative paths in the system identifier. Since the attack occurs relative to the application processing the XML document, an attacker may use this trusted application to pivot to other internal systems, possibly disclosing other internal content via http(s) requests.
XML external entity injection via extern.recommendation: If possible it's recommended to disable parsing of XML external entities.
XML external entity injection via extern.name: XML external entity injection via external file
XML external entity injection via extern.title: 通过外部文件注入XML外部实体
XML external entity injection via extern.suggest: 如果可能，建议禁用解析XML外部实体。
XML external entity injection via extern.refs: {{"CWE-611: Information Exposure Through XML External Entity Reference",http://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/611.html},{"XXE (Xml eXternal Entity) attack",http://archive.cert.uni-stuttgart.de/bugtraq/2002/10/msg00421.html},{"XML External Entity (XXE) Processing",https://www.owasp.org/index.php/XML_External_Entity_(XXE)_Processing}}
XML external entity injection via extern.analyse: 攻击可以包括使用文件：方案或系统标识符中的相对路径来公开可能包含敏感数据（如密码或私有用户数据）的本地文件。由于攻击相对于处理XML文档的应用程序发生，攻击者可能会使用这个受信任的应用程序可以转移到其他内部系统，可能通过http（s）请求披露其他内部内容。

It may be possible to not only manipulate existing queries, but to UNION in arbitrary data, use sub selects, or append additional queries. In some cases, it may be possible to read in or write out to files, or to execute shell commands on the underlying operating system.<br/><br/>Certain SQL Servers such as Microsoft SQL Server contain stored and extended procedures (database server functions). vBulletin 5.1.2 SQL injection.analyse: 攻击者可能在易受攻击的系统上执行任意SQL语句，这可能会危及数据库的完整性和/或暴露敏感信息。<br/> <br/>根据使用的后端数据库，SQL注入漏洞导致对于攻击者的数据/系统访问级别不同，可能不仅可以操纵现有查询，而且可以对UNION进行任意数据处理，使用子选择或追加附加查询。在某些情况下，可能会读入或写入文件或在底层操作系统上执行shell命令。<br/>某些SQL Server（如Microsoft SQL Server）包含存储和扩展过程（数据库服务器功能），如果攻击者可以获取访问权限对于这些程序，可能会损害整个机器。

File upload XSS.impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
File upload XSS.recommendation: Restrict file types accepted for upload: check the file extension and only allow certain files to be uploaded. Use a whitelist approach instead of a blacklist. Check for double extensions such as .php.png. Check for files without a filename like .htaccess (on ASP.NET, check for configuration files like web.config). Change the permissions on the upload folder so the files within it are not executable. If possible, rename the files that are uploaded.
File upload XSS.name: File upload XSS
File upload XSS.title: 文件上传XSS
File upload XSS.suggest: 限制接受上传的文件类型：检查文件扩展名，只允许上传某些文件，使用白名单方法而不是黑名单，检查.php.png等双重扩展名。检查文件名，如.htaccess （在ASP.NET上，检查配置文件，如web.config）更改上传文件夹的权限，使其中的文件不可执行，如果可能，重命名上传的文件。
File upload XSS.refs: {{"OWASP Unrestricted File Upload",http://www.owasp.org/index.php/Unrestricted_File_Upload},{"Why File Upload Forms are a major security threat",http://www.acunetix.com/websitesecurity/upload-forms-threat.htm},{"Testing for Stored Cross site scripting (OWASP-DV-002)",http://www.owasp.org/index.php/Testing_for_Stored_Cross_site_scripting_(OWASP-DV-002)}}
File upload XSS.analyse: 恶意用户可能会将JavaScript，VBScript，ActiveX，HTML或Flash注入易受攻击的应用程序中，以愚弄用户以从中收集数据。\r \n攻击者可以窃取会话cookie并接管帐户，冒充用户。 \r \n也可以修改呈现给用户的页面内容。

Rails remote code execution using render.impact: An attacker could use the request parameters to execute arbitrary ruby code.
Rails remote code execution using render.recommendation:
All users running an affected release should either upgrade or use one of the workarounds immediately. A workaround to this issue is to not pass arbitrary user input to the render
method. Instead, verify that data before passing it to the render method. Consult Web references for more information about this issue.

Rails remote code execution using render.title: Rails远程代码执行使用render：inline
Rails remote code execution using render.suggest: 运行受影响的发行版的所有用户都应该立即升级或使用其中一种解决方法。此问题的解决方法是不将任意用户输入传递给render \r \nmethod，而是将数据传递给render方法有关此问题的更多信息，请参阅Web引用。
Rails remote code execution using render.refs: {{"Possible remote code execution vulnerability in Action Pack.",https://hackerone.com/reports/113928},{"Rails 4.2.5.2, 4.1.14.2 and 3.2.22.2 have been released!",http://weblog.rubyonrails.org/2016/2/29/Rails-4-2-5-2-4-1-14-2-3-2-22-2-have-been-released/}}

ExtJS charts.swf cross site scripting.impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
ExtJS charts.swf cross site scripting.recommendation: Update to TYPO3 versions 4.5.34, 4.7.19, 6.0.14, 6.1.9 or 6.2.3 that fix the problem described or delete the file typo3/contrib/extjs/resources/charts.swf as it is not used by TYPO3 at all.

Typo3 core sanitizeLocalUrl() non-persis.impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
Typo3 core sanitizeLocalUrl() non-persis.recommendation: Update to TYPO3 versions 6.2.15 or 7.4.0 that fix the problem described.
Typo3 core sanitizeLocalUrl() non-persis.name: Typo3 core sanitizeLocalUrl() non-persistent cross-site scripting

Typo3 core sanitizeLocalUrl() non-persis.refs: {{"[CVE-2015-5956] Typo3 Core sanitizeLocalUrl() Non-Persistent Cross-Site Scripting",http://seclists.org/bugtraq/2015/Sep/61},{"TYPO3-CORE-SA-2015-009: Non-Persistent Cross-Site Scripting",https://typo3.org/teams/security/security-bulletins/typo3-core/typo3-core-sa-2015-009/}}
Typo3 core sanitizeLocalUrl() non-persis.analyse: 恶意用户可能会将JavaScript，VBScript，ActiveX，HTML或Flash注入易受攻击的应用程序中，以愚弄用户以从中收集数据。\r \n攻击者可以窃取会话cookie并接管帐户，冒充用户。 \r \n也可以修改呈现给用户的页面内容。

The DROWN attack (SSLv2 supported).impact: DROWN allows attackers to break the encryption and read or steal sensitive communications, including passwords, credit card numbers, trade secrets, or financial data.
The DROWN attack (SSLv2 supported).recommendation:
To protect against DROWN, server operators need to ensure that their private keys are not used anywhere with server software that allows SSLv2 connections. Users can avoid this issue by disabling the SSLv2 protocol in all their SSL/TLS
servers, if they've not done so already. Disabling all SSLv2 ciphers is also sufficient, provided the patches for CVE-2015-3197 (fixed in OpenSSL 1.0.1r and1.0.2f) have been deployed.
The DROWN attack (SSLv2 supported).name: The DROWN attack (SSLv2 supported)
The DROWN attack (SSLv2 supported).title: DROWN攻击（支持SSLv2）
The DROWN attack (SSLv2 supported).suggest: 为了防止DROWN，服务器运营商需要确保其私钥在任何地方都不能使用允许SSLv2连接的服务器软件，用户可以通过在所有SSL / TLS \r \n服务器中禁用SSLv2协议来避免此问题，如果如果没有这样做，禁用所有SSLv2密码也是足够的，只要部署了CVE-2015-3197（在OpenSSL 1.0.1r和1.0.2f中修复）的修补程序。
The DROWN attack (SSLv2 supported).refs: {{"The DROWN Attack",https://drownattack.com/},{"Cross-protocol attack on TLS using SSLv2 (DROWN) (CVE-2016-0800)",https://www.openssl.org/news/secadv/20160301.txt}}
The DROWN attack (SSLv2 supported).analyse: DROWN允许攻击者打破加密，读取或窃取敏感的通信，包括密码，信用卡号，商业秘密或财务数据。

Unrestricted file upload.impact: It may be possible for an attacker to use this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code.
Unrestricted file upload.recommendation: Restrict file types accepted for upload: check the file extension and only allow certain files to be uploaded. Use a whitelist approach instead of a blacklist. Check for double extensions such as .php.png. Check for files without a filename like .htaccess (on ASP.NET, check for configuration files like web.config). Change the permissions on the upload folder so the files within it are not executable. If possible, rename the files that are uploaded.
Unrestricted file upload.name: Unrestricted file upload
Unrestricted file upload.title: 无限制文件上传
Unrestricted file upload.suggest: 限制接受上传的文件类型：检查文件扩展名，只允许上传某些文件，使用白名单方法而不是黑名单，检查.php.png等双重扩展名。检查文件名，如.htaccess （在ASP.NET上，检查配置文件，如web.config）更改上传文件夹的权限，使其中的文件不可执行，如果可能，重命名上传的文件。
Unrestricted file upload.refs: {{"OWASP Unrestricted File Upload",http://www.owasp.org/index.php/Unrestricted_File_Upload},{"Why File Upload Forms are a major security threat",http://www.acunetix.com/websitesecurity/upload-forms-threat.htm}}
Unrestricted file upload.analyse: 攻击者可能会使用此漏洞执行任意代码。

Cross site scripting vulnerability in Ze.impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.

MongoDB injection.impact: The impact of this vulnerability varies depending on the affected application. In the more severe cases it's possible to bypass the user authentication or download arbitrary information from the database.
MongoDB injection.recommendation: If you are passing $_GET/$_POST parameters to your queries, make sure that they are cast to strings first. If you are using JavaScript, make sure that any variables that cross the PHP- to-JavaScript boundary are passed in the scope field of MongoCode, not interpolated into the JavaScript string.
MongoDB injection.name: MongoDB injection
MongoDB injection.title: MongoDB注入
MongoDB injection.suggest: 如果您将$ _GET / $ _ POST参数传递到查询中，请确保将它们转换为字符串，如果您使用JavaScript，请确保跨越PHP到JavaScript边界的任何变量在范围内传递MongoCode的字段，不插入到JavaScript字符串中。
MongoDB injection.refs: {{"PHP Manual MongoDB Security",http://php.net/manual/en/mongo.security.php},{"How does MongoDB address SQL or Query injection?",http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/faq/developers/#how-does-mongodb-address-sql-or-query-injection},{"Server-Side JavaScript Injection",https://media.blackhat.com/bh-us-11/Sullivan/BH_US_11_Sullivan_Server_Side_WP.pdf}}
MongoDB injection.analyse: 该漏洞的影响因受影响的应用程序而异，在更严重的情况下，可以绕过用户认证或从数据库下载任意信息。

XML external entity injection.impact: Attacks can include disclosing local files, which may contain sensitive data such as passwords or private user data, using file: schemes or relative paths in the system identifier. Since the attack occurs relative to the application processing the XML document, an attacker may use this trusted application to pivot to other internal systems, possibly disclosing other internal content via http(s) requests.
XML external entity injection.recommendation: If possible it's recommended to disable parsing of XML external entities.
XML external entity injection.name: XML external entity injection
XML external entity injection.title: XML外部实体注入
XML external entity injection.suggest: 如果可能，建议禁用解析XML外部实体。
XML external entity injection.refs: {{"CWE-611: Information Exposure Through XML External Entity Reference",http://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/611.html},{"XXE (Xml eXternal Entity) attack",http://archive.cert.uni-stuttgart.de/bugtraq/2002/10/msg00421.html},{"XML External Entity (XXE) Processing",https://www.owasp.org/index.php/XML_External_Entity_(XXE)_Processing}}
XML external entity injection.analyse: 攻击可以包括使用文件：方案或系统标识符中的相对路径来公开可能包含敏感数据（如密码或私有用户数据）的本地文件。由于攻击相对于处理XML文档的应用程序发生，攻击者可能会使用这个受信任的应用程序可以转移到其他内部系统，可能通过http（s）请求披露其他内部内容。

Expression language injection.impact:
The impacts of this attack range from a simple HttpOnly bypass to a server-side information
leakage technique. This information leakage will differ in severity mostly based on what J2EE
technologies are in use and what is in scope of the vulnerable code. One of the most dangerous
abuse scenarios involves an attacker controlled page inferring a users session ID on a browser
thats currently logged into the vulnerable application.
Expression language injection.recommendation:
Perform data validation best practice against untrusted input and to ensure that output encoding is applied when data arrives on the EL layer, so that
no metacharacter is found by the interpreter within the user content before evaluation. The most obvious patterns to detect include ${ and #{, but it may be possible to encode or fragment this data.
Expression language injection.name: Expression language injection
Expression language injection.title: 表达语言注入
Expression language injection.suggest: 对不信任的输入执行数据验证最佳做法，并确保在数据到达EL层时应用输出编码，以便在评估之前由用户内容中的解释器找到\r \nno元字符，最明显的模式可以检测包括$ {和＃{，但可能编码或分割此数据。
Expression language injection.analyse:
这种攻击的影响范围从简单的HttpOnly旁路到服务器端信息 
泄漏技术。这种信息泄漏的严重程度将有所不同，主要取决于J2EE  
技术正在使用的范围以及脆弱的代码。最危险的 
abuse方案之一涉及攻击者控制的页面，在当前登录到易受攻击的应用程序的浏览器 
上推断用户会话ID。

RC4 cipher suites detected.impact: An attacker can recover a limited amount of plaintext from a TLS connection when RC4 encryption is used.
RC4 cipher suites detected.recommendation: The most effective countermeasure against this attack is to stop using RC4 in TLS. Consult web references for more information about this attack and how to protect against it.
RC4 cipher suites detected.name: RC4 cipher suites detected
RC4 cipher suites detected.title: 检测到RC4密码套件
RC4 cipher suites detected.suggest: 针对这种攻击的最有效的对策是停止在TLS中使用RC4。有关此攻击的更多信息以及如何防范此类攻击，请查阅网络引用。
RC4 cipher suites detected.refs: {{"Attack of the week: RC4 is kind of broken in TLS",http://blog.cryptographyengineering.com/2013/03/attack-of-week-rc4-is-kind-of-broken-in.html},{"On the Security of RC4 in TLS and WPA",http://www.isg.rhul.ac.uk/tls/}}
RC4 cipher suites detected.analyse: 使用RC4加密时，攻击者可以从TLS连接中恢复有限数量的明文。

Drupal core 7.x SQL injection vulnerabil.impact: An attacker may execute arbitrary SQL statements on the vulnerable system. This may compromise the integrity of your database and/or expose sensitive information. Depending on the content of the requests this can lead to privilege escalation, arbitrary PHP execution, or other attacks.
Drupal core 7.x SQL injection vulnerabil.recommendation: It is recommended to upgrade to the latest version of Drupal. (This issue was fixed in version 7.32).
Drupal core 7.x SQL injection vulnerabil.name: Drupal core 7.x SQL injection vulnerability
Drupal core 7.x SQL injection vulnerabil.title: Drupal核心7.x SQL注入漏洞
Drupal core 7.x SQL injection vulnerabil.suggest: 建议升级到最新版本的Drupal（此问题已在版本7.32中修复）
Drupal core 7.x SQL injection vulnerabil.refs: {{"Advisory 01/2014: Drupal - pre Auth SQL Injection Vulnerability",http://www.sektioneins.de/en/advisories/advisory-012014-drupal-pre-auth-sql-injection-vulnerability.html},{"SA-CORE-2014-005 - Drupal core - SQL injection",https://www.drupal.org/SA-CORE-2014-005}}
Drupal core 7.x SQL injection vulnerabil.analyse: 攻击者可能会在易受攻击的系统上执行任意SQL语句，这可能危及数据库的完整性和/或暴露敏感信息。根据请求的内容，这可能导致权限升级，任意PHP执行或其他攻击。

Cross site scripting (content-sniffing).impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
Cross site scripting (content-sniffing).recommendation: Your script should filter metacharacters from user input.
Cross site scripting (content-sniffing).name: Cross site scripting (content-sniffing)
Cross site scripting (content-sniffing).title: 跨站脚本（内容嗅探）
Cross site scripting (content-sniffing).suggest: 您的脚本应该从用户输入过滤元字符。
Cross site scripting (content-sniffing).refs: {{"Acunetix Cross Site Scripting Attack",http://www.acunetix.com/websitesecurity/cross-site-scripting.htm},{"VIDEO: How Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Works",http://www.acunetix.com/blog/web-security-zone/video-how-cross-site-scripting-xss-works/},{"The Cross Site Scripting Faq",http://www.cgisecurity.com/xss-faq.html},{"OWASP Cross Site Scripting",http://www.owasp.org/index.php/Cross_Site_Scripting},{"XSS Filter Evasion Cheat Sheet",https://www.owasp.org/index.php/XSS_Filter_Evasion_Cheat_Sheet},{"Cross site scripting","http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-site_scripting "},{"OWASP PHP Top 5",http://www.owasp.org/index.php/PHP_Top_5},{"How To: Prevent Cross-Site Scripting in ASP.NET",http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms998274.aspx}}
Cross site scripting (content-sniffing).analyse: 恶意用户可能会将JavaScript，VBScript，ActiveX，HTML或Flash注入易受攻击的应用程序中，以愚弄用户以从中收集数据。\r \n攻击者可以窃取会话cookie并接管帐户，冒充用户。 \r \n也可以修改呈现给用户的页面内容。

Joomla! 1.6/1.7/2.5 privilege escalation.impact: The attacker will have a valid account with permissions to log in to the administrator/ interface, edit one of the templates, and inject php code (assuming the stock permissions/user groups are still in effect). Joomla! versions 1.6.x and 1.7.x also allow users in the "Administrator" group to install extensions, thus opening another avenue for code injection.
Joomla! 1.6/1.7/2.5 privilege escalation.recommendation: Joomla! versions 1.0.x, 1.5.x, and 2.5.3+ are not vulnerable. No patch has been issued for 1.6.x or 1.7.x and users of these versions are strongly urged to upgrade to 2.5.3 immediately.
Joomla! 1.6/1.7/2.5 privilege escalation.name: Joomla! 1.6/1.7/2.5 privilege escalation vulnerability
Joomla! 1.6/1.7/2.5 privilege escalation.title: Joomla！1.6 / 1.7 / 2.5特权升级漏洞
Joomla! 1.6/1.7/2.5 privilege escalation.suggest: Joomla！1.0.x，1.5.x和2.5.3+版本并不容易受到攻击，没有为1.6.x或1.7.x发布补丁，并强烈要求用户升级到2.5.3。
Joomla! 1.6/1.7/2.5 privilege escalation.analyse: 攻击者将具有有权限登录管理员/界面的权限，编辑其中一个模板，并注入php代码（假设库存权限/用户组仍然有效）Joomla！版本1.6.x和1.7.x还允许"管理员"组中的用户安装扩展，从而为代码注入打开另一条路径。

Same site scripting.impact:
An attacker can cheat the RFC2109 (HTTP State Management Mechanism) same origin restrictions, and
therefore hijack state management data.
Same site scripting.recommendation:
It is advised that non-FQ localhost entries be removed from nameserver
configurations for domains that host websites that rely on HTTP state
management.
Same site scripting.name: Same site scripting
Same site scripting.title: 相同的站点脚本
Same site scripting.suggest: 建议从托管依赖于HTTP状态\r \nmanagement的网站的域的名称服务器\r \n配置中删除非FQ本地主机条目。
Same site scripting.refs: {{"Common dns misconfiguration can lead to \"same site\" scripting",http://seclists.org/bugtraq/2008/Jan/270},{"Insecure DNS records in top web projects",http://lab.onsec.ru/2013/07/insecure-dns-records-in-top-web-projects.html}}
Same site scripting.analyse: 攻击者可以欺骗RFC2109（HTTP状态管理机制）相同的起始限制，并且\n \n因此劫持状态管理数据。

Web Application Firewall detected.impact: You may receive incorrect/incomplete results when scanning a server protected by an IPS/IDS/WAF. Also, if the WAF detects a number of attacks coming from the scanner, the IP address can be blocked after a few attempts.
Web Application Firewall detected.recommendation: If possible, it's recommended to scan an internal (development) version of the web application where the WAF is not active.
Web Application Firewall detected.name: Web Application Firewall detected
Web Application Firewall detected.title: 测到Web应用程序防火墙
Web Application Firewall detected.suggest: 如果可能，建议扫描WAF不活动的Web应用程序的内部（开发）版本。
Web Application Firewall detected.analyse: 扫描受IPS / IDS / WAF保护的服务器时，可能会收到不正确/不完整的结果，而且如果WAF检测到来自扫描仪的攻击次数，可能会在几次尝试后阻止IP地址。

AngularJS client-side template injection.impact: An attacker can inject AngularJS expressions that will be evaluated on the client-side. Normally AngularJS expressions are not very dangerous, but when combined with a sandbox escape they allow an attacker to execute arbitrary JavaScript code.
AngularJS client-side template injection.recommendation: It should not be possible for an attacker to inject AngularJS expressions by using curly braces. The application needs to either treat curly braces in user input as highly dangerous or avoid server-side reflection of user input entirely.
AngularJS client-side template injection.name: AngularJS client-side template injection
AngularJS client-side template injection.title: AngularJS客户端模板注入
AngularJS client-side template injection.suggest: 攻击者不可能通过使用花括号注入AngularJS表达式，应用程序需要将用户输入中的大括号视为高度危险的，或者完全避免服务器端反映用户输入。
AngularJS client-side template injection.refs: {{"AngularJS security features and best practices",https://docs.angularjs.org/guide/security},{"XSS without HTML: Client-Side Template Injection with AngularJS",http://blog.portswigger.net/2016/01/xss-without-html-client-side-template.html}}
AngularJS client-side template injection.analyse: 攻击者可以注入将在客户端进行评估的AngularJS表达式，通常AngularJS表达式并不是很危险，但是当与沙盒逸出组合时，它们允许攻击者执行任意JavaScript代码。

YUI uploader.swf cross site scripting.impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
YUI uploader.swf cross site scripting.recommendation:
If you are using or even merely hosting any YUI 2 .swf file, please take steps to remove these files immediately from your hosts. <br/>

YUI 2 is an end-of-lifed project and is no longer supported. All YUI 2 .swf files have been removed from the Yahoo CDN. If your site was taking advantage of the presence of these files on the Yahoo CDN they will no longer be available.
YUI uploader.swf cross site scripting.name: YUI uploader.swf cross site scripting
YUI uploader.swf cross site scripting.title: YUI uploader.swf跨站脚本
YUI uploader.swf cross site scripting.suggest: 如果您正在使用或甚至仅托管任何YUI 2 .swf文件，请采取措施立即从主机中删除这些文件。<br/> \r \n \r \n YUI 2是一个终结的项目，不再支持所有YUI 2 .swf文件已从Yahoo CDN中删除，如果您的网站利用Yahoo CDN上的这些文件的存在，它们将不再可用。
YUI uploader.swf cross site scripting.refs: {{"Security Bulletin: Addressing a Vulnerability in YUI 2.5.0 through YUI 2.9.0",http://yuilibrary.com/support/20131111-vulnerability/},{"YUI 'uploader.swf' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability",http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/63660/info},{"YUI Security Issue found in uploader.swf",http://www.vbulletin.com/forum/forum/vbulletin-announcements/vbulletin-announcements_aa/4014388-yui-security-issue-found-in-uploader-swf}}
YUI uploader.swf cross site scripting.analyse: 恶意用户可能会将JavaScript，VBScript，ActiveX，HTML或Flash注入易受攻击的应用程序中，以愚弄用户以从中收集数据。\r \n攻击者可以窃取会话cookie并接管帐户，冒充用户。 \r \n也可以修改呈现给用户的页面内容。

Joomla! component Kunena Forum multiple.impact: An attacker may execute arbitrary SQL statements on the vulnerable system. This may compromise the integrity of your database and/or expose sensitive information. <br/><br/>Depending on the back-end database in use, SQL injection vulnerabilities lead to varying levels of data/system access for the attacker. It may be possible to not only manipulate existing queries, but to UNION in arbitrary data, use sub selects, or append additional queries. In some cases, it may be possible to read in or write out to files, or to execute shell commands on the underlying operating system.<br/><br/>Certain SQL Servers such as Microsoft SQL Server contain stored and extended procedures (database server functions). If an attacker can obtain access to these procedures it may be possible to compromise the entire machine.
Joomla! component Kunena Forum multiple.recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of Kunena Forum (this problems was fixed in version 3.0.6).
Joomla! component Kunena Forum multiple.name: Joomla! component Kunena Forum multiple vulnerabilities
Joomla! component Kunena Forum multiple.title: Joomla！组件Kunena论坛多个漏洞
Joomla! component Kunena Forum multiple.suggest: 升级到最新版本的Kunena论坛（这个问题在3.0.6版中修复了）
Joomla! component Kunena Forum multiple.analyse: 攻击者可能在易受攻击的系统上执行任意SQL语句，这可能会危及数据库的完整性和/或暴露敏感信息。<br/> <br/>根据使用的后端数据库，SQL注入漏洞导致对于攻击者的数据/系统访问级别不同，可能不仅可以操纵现有查询，而且可以对UNION进行任意数据处理，使用子选择或追加附加查询。在某些情况下，可能会读入或写入文件或在底层操作系统上执行shell命令。<br/>某些SQL Server（如Microsoft SQL Server）包含存储和扩展过程（数据库服务器功能），如果攻击者可以获取访问权限对于这些程序，可能会损害整个机器。

Host header attack AcuMonitor.impact: An attacker can manipulate the Host header as seen by the web application and cause the application to behave in unexpected ways.
Host header attack AcuMonitor.recommendation:
The web application should use the SERVER_NAME instead of the Host header.
It should also create a dummy vhost that catches all requests with unrecognized Host headers. This can also be done under Nginx by specifying a non-wildcard SERVER_NAME, and under Apache by using a non-wildcard serverName and turning the UseCanonicalName directive on. Consult references for detailed information.
Host header attack AcuMonitor.name: Host header attack AcuMonitor
Host header attack AcuMonitor.title: 主机头攻击AcuMonitor
Host header attack AcuMonitor.suggest: Web应用程序应该使用SERVER_NAME而不是主机头。\r \n它还应该创建一个虚拟的虚拟主机，用于捕获所有具有无法识别的主机头的请求，这也可以在Nginx下通过指定一个非通配符SERVER_NAME来完成， Apache通过使用非通配符serverName并转换UseCanonicalName指令。有关详细信息，请参阅参考。
Host header attack AcuMonitor.refs: {{"Practical HTTP Host header attacks",http://www.skeletonscribe.net/2013/05/practical-http-host-header-attacks.html},{Apache,http://httpd.apache.org/docs/trunk/vhosts/examples.html#defaultallports},{nginx,http://wiki.nginx.org/ServerBlockExample},{"Automated Detection of Host Header Attacks",http://www.acunetix.com/blog/articles/automated-detection-of-host-header-attacks/}}
Host header attack AcuMonitor.analyse: 攻击者可以操纵Web应用程序所看到的主机头，并导致应用程序以意想不到的方式运行。

Unfiltered header injection in Apache 1..impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
Unfiltered header injection in Apache 1..recommendation: Upgrade to the latest Apache versions. This flaw has been corrected in Apache versions (1.3.35/2.0.58/2.2.2)
Unfiltered header injection in Apache 1..name: Unfiltered header injection in Apache 1.3.34/2.0.57/2.2.1
Unfiltered header injection in Apache 1..title: Apache 1.3.34 / 2.0.57 / 2.2.1中的未过滤标头注入
Unfiltered header injection in Apache 1..suggest: 升级到最新的Apache版本。这个缺陷在Apache版本（1.3.35 / 2.0.58 / 2.2.2）中得到了更正
Unfiltered header injection in Apache 1..refs: {{"Unfiltered Header Injection in Apache 1.3.34/2.0.57/2.2.1",http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/433280},{"Forging HTTP request headers with Flash",http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/441014/30/0/threaded},{"Apache homepage",http://httpd.apache.org/}}
Unfiltered header injection in Apache 1..analyse: 恶意用户可能会注入JavaScript，VBScript，ActiveX，HTML或Flash来愚弄用户，以便从中收集数据。\r \n攻击者可以窃取会话cookie并接管帐户，模拟用户。\r \n也可以修改呈现给用户的页面的内容。

Blind SQL Injection.impact: An attacker may execute arbitrary SQL statements on the vulnerable system. This may compromise the integrity of your database and/or expose sensitive information. <br/><br/>Depending on the back-end database in use, SQL injection vulnerabilities lead to varying levels of data/system access for the attacker. It may be possible to not only manipulate existing queries, but to UNION in arbitrary data, use sub selects, or append additional queries. In some cases, it may be possible to read in or write out to files, or to execute shell commands on the underlying operating system.<br/><br/>Certain SQL Servers such as Microsoft SQL Server contain stored and extended procedures (database server functions). If an attacker can obtain access to these procedures it may be possible to compromise the entire machine.
Blind SQL Injection.recommendation: Your script should filter metacharacters from user input. <br/>Check detailed information for more information about fixing this vulnerability.
Blind SQL Injection.name: Blind SQL Injection
Blind SQL Injection.title: 盲人SQL注入

Blind SQL Injection.analyse: 攻击者可能会在可怕的系统上执行任意SQL语句，这可能会损害数据库的完整性和/或暴露敏感信息。<br/> <br/>根据使用的后端数据库，SQL注入漏洞导致攻击者的数据/系统访问级别不同，可能不仅可以操纵现有查询，而且可以对UNION进行任意数据处理，使用子选择或追加附加查询。在某些情况下，可能会读取存在或写出文件，或在底层操作系统上执行shell命令。<br/>某些SQL Server（如Microsoft SQL Server）包含存储和扩展过程（数据库服务器功能）。如果攻击者可以访问这些程序，可能会损害整个机器。

Possible remote SWF inclusion.impact: An attacker could include a remote SWF file and execute arbitrary JavaScript and/or ActionScript code. The attacker can use JavaScript to perform any action on behalf of the user (for example, perform a transaction on an online banking system) or change the way the website appears to the user (for example, perform a phishing attack).
Possible remote SWF inclusion.recommendation: The product used to create this SWF file (Techsmith Camtasia, InfoSoft FusionCharts, Adobe Acrobat Connect, Macromedia Breeze, Adobe Dreamweaver, Adobe Contribute, Autodemo) should be upgraded to the latest version and the SWF file should be recompiled with the fixed version.
Possible remote SWF inclusion.name: Possible remote SWF inclusion
Possible remote SWF inclusion.title: 可能的远程SWF包含
Possible remote SWF inclusion.suggest: 用于创建此SWF文件的产品（Techsmith Camtasia，InfoSoft FusionCharts，Adobe Acrobat Connect，Macromedia Breeze，Adobe Dreamweaver，Adobe Contribute，Autodemo）应升级到最新版本，SWF文件应使用固定版本重新编译。
Possible remote SWF inclusion.refs: {{"XSS Vulnerabilities in Common Shockwave Flash Files ",https://docs.google.com/Doc?docid=ajfxntc4dmsq_14dt57ssdw}}
Possible remote SWF inclusion.analyse: 攻击者可以包括远程SWF文件并执行任意JavaScript和/或ActionScript代码，攻击者可以使用JavaScript代表用户执行任何操作（例如，在网上银行系统上执行交易）或改变方式该网站对用户显示（例如，执行网络钓鱼攻击）

LDAP injection.impact: When an attacker is able to modify an LDAP statement, the process will run with the same permissions as the component that executed the command. (e.g. Database server, Web application server, Web server, etc.). This can cause serious security problems where the permissions grant the rights to query, modify or remove anything inside the LDAP tree.
LDAP injection.recommendation: Your script should filter metacharacters from user input.
LDAP injection.name: LDAP injection
LDAP injection.title: LDAP注入
LDAP injection.suggest: 您的脚本应该从用户输入过滤元字符。
LDAP injection.analyse: 当攻击者能够修改LDAP语句时，该进程将以与执行命令的组件相同的权限运行（例如数据库服务器，Web应用程序服务器，Web服务器等），这可能会导致严重的安全问题其中权限授予在LDAP树中查询，修改或删除任何内容的权限。\r \n

ColdFusion 8 FCKEditor file upload vulne.impact: An attacker can upload and execute malicious code, taking control of the server.
ColdFusion 8 FCKEditor file upload vulne.recommendation: One fix is to edit the <strong><span class="bb-dark">config.cfm</span></strong> file at <strong><span class="bb-dark">\CFIDE\scripts\ajax\FCKeditor\editor\filemanager\connectors\cfm</span></strong> to disable uploads (consult <strong>CF8 and FCKEditor Security threat</strong>) .<br/> Also, Adobe released a security patch for this issue and is a very high level patch that should be applied to your servers (consult <strong>Hotfix available for potential ColdFusion 8 input sanitization issue</strong>).
ColdFusion 8 FCKEditor file upload vulne.name: ColdFusion 8 FCKEditor file upload vulnerability
ColdFusion 8 FCKEditor file upload vulne.title: ColdFusion 8 FCKEditor文件上传漏洞
ColdFusion 8 FCKEditor file upload vulne.suggest: 一个修复是编辑<strong> <span class = "bb-dark "> config.cfm </ span> </ strong>文件在<strong> <span class = "bb-dark "> \CFIDE \scripts \ajax \FCKeditor \editor \filemanager \connectors \cfm </ span> </ strong>以禁用上传（请参阅<strong> CF8和FCKEditor安全威胁</ strong>）此外，Adobe还发布了一个针对此问题的安全修补程序，并且是应用于服务器的高级别补丁程序（请参阅<strong> Hotfix可用于潜在的ColdFusion 8输入消毒问题</ strong>）。
ColdFusion 8 FCKEditor file upload vulne.analyse: 攻击者可以上传并执行恶意代码，控制服务器。

Cross domain data hijacking.impact: An attacker can read any secrets (such as CSRF tokens) from the affected domain.
Cross domain data hijacking.recommendation:
For file uploads: It is recommended to check the file's content to have the correct header and format. If possible, use "Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=Filename.Extension;" header for the files that do not need to be served in the web browser. Isolating the domain of the uploaded files is also a good solution as long as the crossdomain.xml file of the main website does not include the isolated domain. <br/><br/>

For other cases: For JSONP abuses or other cases when the attacker control the top part of the page, you need to perform proper input filtering to protect against this type of issues.
Cross domain data hijacking.name: Cross domain data hijacking
Cross domain data hijacking.title: 跨域数据劫持
Cross domain data hijacking.suggest: 对于文件上传：建议检查文件内容是否具有正确的标题和格式，如果可能，请使用不需要的文件的"Content-Disposition：attachment; filename = Filename.Extension;"标题只要主要网站的crossdomain.xml文件不包括孤立的域名，就可以分离上传的文件的域名。<br/> <br/> \r \n \r \n对于其他情况：对于JSONP滥用或其他情况，当攻击者控制页面的顶部时，您需要执行适当的输入过滤以防止此类问题。
Cross domain data hijacking.refs: {{"Cross Domain Data Hijacking ",https://soroush.secproject.com/blog/2014/05/even-uploading-a-jpg-file-can-lead-to-cross-domain-data-hijacking-client-side-attack/},{"The pitfalls of allowing file uploads on your website",http://labs.detectify.com/post/86302927946/the-lesser-known-pitfalls-of-allowing-file-uploads}}
Cross domain data hijacking.analyse: 攻击者可以从受影响的域中读取任何秘密（如CSRF令牌）。

XML external entity injection via File U.impact: Attacks can include disclosing local files, which may contain sensitive data such as passwords or private user data, using file: schemes or relative paths in the system identifier. Since the attack occurs relative to the application processing the XML document, an attacker may use this trusted application to pivot to other internal systems, possibly disclosing other internal content via http(s) requests.
XML external entity injection via File U.recommendation: If possible it's recommended to disable parsing of XML external entities.
XML external entity injection via File U.name: XML external entity injection via File Upload
XML external entity injection via File U.title: 通过文件上传的XML外部实体注入
XML external entity injection via File U.suggest: 如果可能，建议禁用解析XML外部实体。
XML external entity injection via File U.refs: {{"CWE-611: Information Exposure Through XML External Entity Reference",http://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/611.html},{"XXE (Xml eXternal Entity) attack",http://archive.cert.uni-stuttgart.de/bugtraq/2002/10/msg00421.html},{"XML External Entity (XXE) Processing",https://www.owasp.org/index.php/XML_External_Entity_(XXE)_Processing}}
XML external entity injection via File U.analyse: 攻击可以包括使用文件：方案或系统标识符中的相对路径来公开可能包含敏感数据（如密码或私有用户数据）的本地文件。由于攻击相对于处理XML文档的应用程序发生，攻击者可能会使用这个受信任的应用程序可以转移到其他内部系统，可能通过http（s）请求披露其他内部内容。

Uncontrolled format string.impact: An attacker can possibly read values from the stack, cause segmentation faults/software crashes and even execute arbitrary code on the server.
Uncontrolled format string.recommendation: Ensure that all format string functions are passed a static string which cannot be controlled by the user and that the proper number of arguments are always sent to that function as well. If at all possible, use functions that do not support the %n operator in format strings.

Uncontrolled format string.title: 不受控制的格式字符串
Uncontrolled format string.suggest: 确保所有的格式字符串函数都传递一个静态字符串，这个静态字符串不能被用户控制，并且适当数量的参数也始终发送到该函数，如果可能的话，使用不支持％n运算符的函数格式字符串
Uncontrolled format string.analyse: 攻击者可能会从堆栈读取值，导致分段错误/软件崩溃甚至在服务器上执行任意代码。

SQL injection in the authentication head.impact: An attacker may execute arbitrary SQL statements on the vulnerable system. This may compromise the integrity of your database and/or expose sensitive information. <br/><br/>Depending on the back-end database in use, SQL injection vulnerabilities lead to varying levels of data/system access for the attacker. It may be possible to not only manipulate existing queries, but to UNION in arbitrary data, use sub selects, or append additional queries. In some cases, it may be possible to read in or write out to files, or to execute shell commands on the underlying operating system.<br/><br/>Certain SQL Servers such as Microsoft SQL Server contain stored and extended procedures (database server functions). If an attacker can obtain access to these procedures it may be possible to compromise the entire machine.
SQL injection in the authentication head.recommendation: Your script should filter metacharacters from user input. <br/>Check detailed information for more information about fixing this vulnerability.
SQL injection in the authentication head.name: SQL injection in the authentication header
SQL injection in the authentication head.title: 认证头中的SQL注入
SQL injection in the authentication head.suggest: 您的脚本应该从用户输入过滤元字符。"请检查详细信息以获取有关修复此漏洞的更多信息。
SQL injection in the authentication head.refs: {{"Acunetix SQL Injection Attack",http://www.acunetix.com/websitesecurity/sql-injection.htm},{"How to check for SQL injection vulnerabilities",http://www.acunetix.com/websitesecurity/sql-injection2/},{"VIDEO: SQL Injection tutorial",http://www.acunetix.com/blog/web-security-zone/video-sql-injection-tutorial/},{"OWASP Injection Flaws",http://www.owasp.org/index.php/Injection_Flaws},{"SQL Injection Walkthrough",http://www.securiteam.com/securityreviews/5DP0N1P76E.html},{"OWASP PHP Top 5",http://www.owasp.org/index.php/PHP_Top_5}}
SQL injection in the authentication head.analyse: 攻击者可能在易受攻击的系统上执行任意SQL语句，这可能会危及数据库的完整性和/或暴露敏感信息。<br/> <br/>根据使用的后端数据库，SQL注入漏洞导致对于攻击者的数据/系统访问级别不同，可能不仅可以操纵现有查询，而且可以对UNION进行任意数据处理，使用子选择或追加附加查询。在某些情况下，可能会读入或写入文件或在底层操作系统上执行shell命令。<br/>某些SQL Server（如Microsoft SQL Server）包含存储和扩展过程（数据库服务器功能），如果攻击者可以获取访问权限对于这些程序，可能会损害整个机器。

CRLF injection/HTTP response splitting.impact: Is it possible for a remote attacker to inject custom HTTP headers. For example, an attacker can inject session cookies or HTML code. This may conduct to vulnerabilities like XSS (cross-site scripting) or session fixation.
CRLF injection/HTTP response splitting.recommendation: You need to restrict CR(0x13) and LF(0x10) from the user input or properly encode the output in order to prevent the injection of custom HTTP headers.
CRLF injection/HTTP response splitting.name: CRLF injection/HTTP response splitting
CRLF injection/HTTP response splitting.title: CRLF注入/ HTTP响应分裂
CRLF injection/HTTP response splitting.suggest: 您需要从用户输入中限制CR（0x13）和LF（0x10），或对输出进行适当编码，以防止引入自定义HTTP头。
CRLF injection/HTTP response splitting.refs: {{"Acunetix CRLF Injection Attack",http://www.acunetix.com/websitesecurity/crlf-injection.htm},{"Whitepaper -  HTTP Response Splitting",http://packetstormsecurity.org/papers/general/whitepaper_httpresponse.pdf},{"Introduction to HTTP Response Splitting",http://www.securiteam.com/securityreviews/5WP0E2KFGK.html}}
CRLF injection/HTTP response splitting.analyse: 远程攻击者可以注入自定义HTTP头，例如，攻击者可以注入会话cookie或HTML代码，这可能会导致XSS（跨站点脚本）或会话固定等漏洞。

Liferay JSON service API authentication.impact:
An attacker could exploit the vulnerability to  become administrator and
retrieve or publish any kind of data on Liferay.

It is also possible to inject a web command shell on the Liferay machine.

攻击者可以利用该漏洞成为管理员，并且 
在Liferay上发布或发布任何类型的数据。 
  
也可以在Liferay机器上注入Web命令外壳。

FCKeditor spellchecker.php cross site sc.impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
FCKeditor spellchecker.php cross site sc.recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of FCKeditor.
FCKeditor spellchecker.php cross site sc.name: FCKeditor spellchecker.php cross site scripting vulnerability
FCKeditor spellchecker.php cross site sc.title: FCKeditor spellchecker.php跨站脚本漏洞
FCKeditor spellchecker.php cross site sc.analyse: 恶意用户可能会将JavaScript，VBScript，ActiveX，HTML或Flash注入易受攻击的应用程序中，以愚弄用户以从中收集数据。\r \n攻击者可以窃取会话cookie并接管帐户，冒充用户。 \r \n也可以修改呈现给用户的页面内容。

File inclusion.impact: It is possible for a remote attacker to include a file from local or remote resources and/or execute arbitrary script code with the privileges of the web-server.
File inclusion.recommendation:
Edit the source code to ensure that input is properly validated. Where is possible, it is recommended to make a list of accepted filenames and restrict the input to that list.<br/><br/>
For PHP, the option <strong>allow_url_fopen</strong> would normally allow a programmer to open, include or otherwise use a remote file using a URL rather than a local file path. It is recommended to disable this option from php.ini.
File inclusion.name: File inclusion
File inclusion.title: 文件包含
File inclusion.suggest: 编辑源代码以确保输入被正确验证。可能的地方，建议列出接受的文件名，并将输入限制在该列表中。<br/> <br/> \r \n对于PHP，选项<strong> allow_url_fopen </ strong>通常允许程序员使用URL而不是本地文件路径打开，包含或以其他方式使用远程文件，建议从php.ini禁用此选项。
File inclusion.analyse: 远程攻击者可以从本地或远程资源中包含一个文件和/或使用Web服务器的权限执行任意脚本代码。

Railo administration panel cross-site sc.impact:
Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them.
An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user.
It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.

Unicode transformation issues.impact: Software vulnerabilities arise when Best-Fit mappings occur. For example, characters can be manipulated to bypass string handling filters, such as cross-site scripting (XSS) or SQL Injection filters, WAF's, and IDS devices. Overlong UTF-8 sequence could be abused to bypass UTF-8 substring tests that look only for the shortest possible encoding.
Unicode transformation issues.recommendation: Identify the source of these Unicode transformation issues and fix them. Consult the web references below for more information.
Unicode transformation issues.name: Unicode transformation issues
Unicode transformation issues.title: Unicode转换问题
Unicode transformation issues.suggest: 确定这些Unicode转换问题的来源并修复它们，请参阅下面的Web引用更多信息。
Unicode transformation issues.refs: {{"Unicode Security",http://www.blackhat.com/presentations/bh-usa-09/WEBER/BHUSA09-Weber-UnicodeSecurityPreview-PAPER.pdf},{"UTF-8 and Unicode FAQ for Unix/Linux",http://www.cl.cam.ac.uk/~mgk25/unicode.html},{"A couple of unicode issues on PHP and Firefox",http://sirdarckcat.blogspot.ro/2009/10/couple-of-unicode-issues-on-php-and.html},{"Unicode Security Considerations",http://www.unicode.org/reports/tr36/}}
Unicode transformation issues.analyse: 发生Best-Fit映射时会出现软件漏洞，例如，可以处理字符以绕过字符串处理过滤器，例如跨站点脚本（XSS）或SQL注入过滤器，WAF和IDS设备。超长的UTF-8序列被滥用来绕过仅查找最短编码的UTF-8子串测试。\r \n
